# Overview

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository will host materials related to the pre-conference workshop on quantitative approach in linguistics ([flyer](http://www.instagram.com/p/DEYcSVUz9aF/?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==)) in conjunction with the International Congress of the Linguistic Society of Indonesia 2025 ([flyer](https://www.facebook.com/photo/?fbid=2698670736980791&set=a.347268062121082)).
